channel.title: Projects on Fossinating
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Fossinating

item.title: Course Manager
item.description: Course Manager is a web app designed to help UNC students plan their schedules. Feature plans include saved courses, an accounts system, multiple schedules, and sharing schedules with friends.

item.title: Slimey Dungeons
item.description: Slimey Dungeons is a puzzle game centered around Sam the slime in his journey from being a dungeon monster to a dungeon raider.

item.title: Chaindle
item.description: Chaindle is a clone of popular word game Wordle by Josh Wardle. In this version, players are given an infinite chain of target words, with each successful guess granting the player additional guesses and changing the target word.
